inclusion.criterion: Males or females aged 18 to 70 years.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Heart failure symptoms NYHA functional class II to IV
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Left ventricular ejection fraction lower than 40 percent determined by bi-dimensional echocardiography using modified Simpsons rule for ventricular volumes.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: CHF due to ischemic heart disease, valvular disease or any other etiology different than pulmonary hypertension.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has severe dyspneic symptomology preventing outpatient living, but refused right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil. Pulmonology recommended an empiric, compassionate sildenafil trial.
